text:
Mediafly | Sr. iOS Engineer | Chicago | Full Time | Onsite

Mediafly is a high-growth, fast-paced software-as-a-service company that helps enterprises turn their content and data into compelling mobile experiences. Our products tie web-based content management with native, fully branded mobile and tablet apps. We have a lean, growing team of passionate engineers and professionals that love to build great products and solve big problems. Our team is highly collaborative and a lot of fun. The best ideas, design and implementation win. We love to design, build, ship, and improve our products to make our customersâ€™ lives better every day.

Lots more about who we are looking for and what we do, here: https://www.mediafly.com/who-is-mediafly/careers/senior-ios-...
